About

HAVRE DE GRACE

Quick Bio

Havre De Grace is the independent singer-songwriter project of Stefan Auvache Bradley.

Influenced by artists like Bob Dylan, Led Zeppelin, Jack White, John Mayer, and The Tallest Man on Earth, Stefan aims to deliver an energetic, in-the-moment performance with nothing but his guitar and his voice.

Stefan's debut release - "I Want to Be Yours and Other Songs" came out in summer 2025.
